briefTitle: A Study of Retreatment With Rituximab in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Receiving Background Methotrexate
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study of Retreatment With Rituximab in Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis Receiving Background Methotrexate
summary: This is a Phase III, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter study evaluating the efficacy of retreatment with rituximab in subjects with active rheumatoid arthritis (RA) who are receiving Methotrexate (MTX).

primaryOutcome.measure: Retreated Subjects With an American College of Rheumatology 20% (ACR20) Response at Week 48 Relative to Baseline
